entry.title: Everest EBB48G-24 49" Glass Door Back Bar Coolers
entry.summary:
Vendor: Everest
Type: Back Bar Coolers
Price: 2298.00

Everest EBB48G-24 49" Glass Door Back Bar Coolers

  • Analog dial thermostat knob (32°F to 42°F)
  • Heavy duty stainless steel countertop, textured and laminated black vinyl exterior
  • Galvanized steel interior wall and stainless steel floor
  • High quality 16 gauge stainless steel worktop
  • 1 3/4" thick high density foamed-in-place polyurethane insulation
  • Slide-out condensing unit for convenient repair and maintenance
  • Forced-air cooling with dual evaporator fan motors providing balanced airflow throughout cabinet to ensure faster temperature drop
  • Energy efficient condensate drain pan assembly heated by high side copper tube
  • Heavy duty die cast door handles with door locks
  • Low emissivity double pane glass system reflects UV rays and improves insulation for maximize energy efficiency
  • Shielded vertical LED interior lighting on/off switch (available from 2015 models)
  • Two epoxy coated wire shelves
  • Built-in caster thread receptacles for all units
  • 3 Year Parts and Labor Warranty / 5 Year Compressor Warranty
  • Dimensions: 49"L X 24-1/2"D X 37-1/8"H

entry.title: Everest ESC83R 82-5/8" Right Compressor Curved Glass Refrigerated Sushi Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Everest
Type: Sushi Cases
Price: 3010.00

Everest ESC83R 82-5/8" Right Compressor Curved Glass Refrigerated Sushi Case

  • Factory preset temperature, 38°F at ambient temperature 80°F (no control equipped)
  • Large single piece, clear, curved glass display window offering wide viewing area from top to bottom
  • ABS plastic front, top, bottom and sides of exterior, stainless steel interior floor
  • Foamed-in-place polyurethane insulation cabinet construction
  • Right (or left) condenser design to suit installation preference
  • Rear condenser airfow intake and side louver exhaust
  • Removable condenser air filter
  • Triple loops of nickel plated copper tube evaporator, and lower copper tube evaporator located in inner layer of stainless steel floor to cool down floor temperature
  • 6 3/4" high removable glass doors
  • Plastic sanitary trays
  • 3 Year Parts and Labor Warranty / 5 Year Compressor Warranty
  • Dimensions: 82-5/8"L X 14"D X 11-1/8"H

  • Factory preset temperature, 38°F at ambient temperature 80°F (no control equipped)
  • Large single piece, clear, curved glass display window offering wide viewing area from top to bottom
  • ABS plastic front, top, bottom and sides of exterior, stainless steel interior floor
  • Foamed-in-place polyurethane insulation cabinet construction
  • Right (or left) condenser design to suit installation preference
  • Rear condenser airfow intake and side louver exhaust
  • Removable condenser air filter
  • Triple loops of nickel plated copper tube evaporator, and lower copper tube evaporator located in inner layer of stainless steel floor to cool down floor temperature
  • 6 3/4" high removable glass doors
  • Plastic sanitary trays
  • 3 Year Parts and Labor Warranty / 5 Year Compressor Warranty
  • Dimensions: 59"L X 14"D X 11-1/8"H
